Game Data¶

class battlenet_client.d3.game_data.GameData¶
static era(client, region_tag: str, era_id: Optional[int] = None, locale: Optional[str] = None)¶

Returns an index of eras, or index of leaderboards for the era

Parameters

  • (obj (client) – oauth): OpenID/OAuth instance

  • region_tag (str) – region_tag abbreviation

  • locale (str) – which locale to use for the request

  • era_id (int) – the ID of the era

Returns

the dict containing for the index of sea, or the leaderboard

for the given season

Return type

dict

static era_leaderboard(client, region_tag: str, era_id: int, leaderboard_id: str, locale: Optional[str] = None)¶

Returns the leaderboard for the specified era by slug

Parameters

  • (obj (client) – oauth): OpenID/OAuth instance

  • region_tag (str) – region_tag abbreviation

  • locale (str) – which locale to use for the request

  • era_id (int) – the ID of the season

  • leaderboard_id (str) – the slug of the leaderboard

Returns

the dict containing for the leaderboard for the given season

Return type

dict

static season(client, region_tag: str, season_id: Optional[int] = None, locale: Optional[str] = None)¶

Returns an index of seasons, or a leaderboard of the specified season

Parameters

  • (obj (client) – oauth): OpenID/OAuth instance

  • region_tag (str) – region_tag abbreviation

  • locale (str) – which locale to use for the request

  • season_id (int) – the ID of the season

Returns

The dict containing for the index of seasons, or the index of

the leaderboards for the given season

Return type

dict

static season_leaderboard(client, region_tag: str, season_id: int, leaderboard_id: str, locale: Optional[str] = None)¶

Returns the leaderboard for the specified season by slug

Parameters

  • (obj (client) – oauth): OpenID/OAuth instance

  • region_tag (str) – region_tag abbreviation

  • locale (str) – which locale to use for the request

  • season_id (int) – the ID of the season

  • leaderboard_id (Str) – the slug of the leaderboard

Returns

the dict containing for the leaderboard for the given season

Return type
